title: When will Apple stop selling the iPod Touch? - Quora

response.answer_text: It all depends on the sales for iPod and whether people like buying the product. But in my opinion I would say they would stop selling in the up coming year or so or if something else more popular and similar comes in play and takes over sales from Apple.
When it stops making money for them to do so. There apparently is still a market for a phoneless iPhone, so the Touch got enough of an upgrade to qualify for IOS 13.
